PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-07162023-07-06PMO
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of GARY DROUIN, full-time member and Vice-Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, for the period he is acting as Chairperson, effective November 5, 2022, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Chairperson.

precis: Order fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of GARY DROUIN, full-time member and Vice-Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, for the period he is acting as Chairperson, effective November 5, 2022, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Chairperson.
